name: Midway Motel
description:
Description

Midway Motel is a short horror project that I worked on over the course of a few months when I could find the motivation. That being said, it should take about 15 minutes to complete but can vary heavily if the puzzles are tough or simply unclear. It's "complete" as far as you can reach an end but is still missing features I had planned to add as well as polish beyond that. 

Bugs

I'm sure there are bugs in the game but I tried to clean up anything I found that was game-breaking. If you do find any specific bugs definitely let me know and I'll do my best to fix them for the future. 

Why?

I haven't worked on this project for a while so I figured it made sense to make it available. There is always the possibility more will be added but I'd like to look at that in the future with a fresh perspective on the games story and themes. Hopefully anyone who plays it can find some fun in it
